text: Anyone know of a way to hide the number input on a number input whose display is set to slider? i.e. `hidden_subfield`? Doesn't look like there's a way, but thought I'd ask.

Good job, Matteo. :wink: The only things I would look out for, although it's fairly minimal to work with, you're still loading in ~153 kb of external CSS and ~77 kb of external JS (since you're loading Bootstrap's CSS and JS), which is quite a lot for a simple accordion.
